articles.title: Soccer-Late Dumfries header secures Dutch win after Ukraine fightback - The Star Online
articles.description: AMSTERDAM (Reuters) -Flying full back Denzel Dumfries scored a late winner to earn the Netherlands a 3-2 victory over Ukraine in a thrilling Group C opener at the European Championship on Sunday after the Dutch had thrown away a two-goal lead.

articles.title: Komoly belső konfliktusok a franciáknál, Giroud Mbappéékat kritizálta - Goal.com
articles.description: Spain midfielder Rodri admits there has been a “fear” among the squad this week that a positive test for Covid-19 could rule them out of the European Championships after an outbreak threatened to derail their preparations.

articles.title: Football: Sterling gives England opening Euro 2020 win over Croatia - CNA
articles.description: LONDON: Raheem Sterling finally found his tournament touch when his 61st-minute goal gave England a deserved 1-0 win over Croatia at Wembley on Sunday (Jun 13) as they began a European Championship with a victory for the first time in nine attempts.

articles.title: England rewriting historic failings as Raheem Sterling, Kalvin Phillips shine in Croatia win - ESPN
articles.description: England had never won their opening game at a European Championship, but Gareth Southgate changed that. And he did it his way.
